Question.Subject: i wanna upload some photos on google earth?
Question.Content: i upload some photos on panoramio site but i cant show on google earth software tell me the way by which we can see photos on google earth tell me the way in brief
Question.ChosenAnswer:
I assume that you want these photos to be viewable in the GE layers? The easiest way to add photos to the layers is to open a free panoramio account and upload them there. You will need to position them on the globe after you upload them. If they qualify, they will eventually be added to the panoramio layer in the geographic web. You will also get a network link for your images which you can use immediately to see them in GE.
http://www.panoramio.com/
Read the FAQ on the panoramio site to get an idea of the type of photos which get added to GE and which ones don't.

You will also get a network link for your images which you can use immediately to see them in GE.
http://www.panoramio.com/
Read the FAQ on the panoramio site to get an idea of the type of photos which get added to GE and which ones don't.
